original_text: Moreover his mother made him a little coat, and brought it to him from year to year, when she came up with her husband to offer the yearly sacrifice.
korean_text: 그의 어머니가 매년 드리는 제사를 드리러 그의 남편과 함께 올라갈 때마다 작은 겉옷을 지어다가 그에게 주었더니

sentences.original_text: Moreover his mother made him a little coat
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그의 어머니는 그에게 작은 겉옷을 만들어 주었고

sentences.original_text: and brought it to him from year to year
when she came up with her husband
